article_title: The World Isn't Safer. So Why Has the National Security Budget Decreased By 15%?
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: Since 2011, defense spending has fallen by 15 percent. Given the world is not 15 percent safer, it's time for Washington to pay for the security we need.
